entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Clyde River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:03 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -20.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clyde River Airport 08:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -20.1°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -22.3°C
Wind: NNW 63 km/h gust 80 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Blizzard. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending early this afternoon then cloudy. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:05 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:05 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
